title: Executive Order 5198-Amendment to Schedule A, Subdivision IX of the Civil Service Rules
content: Subdivision IX Schedule A of the Civil Service rules is hereby amended and an additional paragraph to be known as No. 6 is added reading as follows:
"Two assistants to the Secretary in the Office of the Secretary of Agriculture."
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5198-Amendment to Schedule A, Subdivision IX of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360896
